Package sailpoint.task

Class BasePluginTaskExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.task.AbstractTaskExecutor
      • sailpoint.task.BasePluginTaskExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseExecutor, TaskExecutor, PluginContext
    public abstract class BasePluginTaskExecutor
extends AbstractTaskExecutor
implements PluginContext
    Base class that a plugin task executor implementation should inherit from if it needs to leverage common functionality that plugin task executors may need such as getting a connection to the plugins datasource or reading a plugin configuration value.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class sailpoint.task.AbstractTaskExecutor

      • prepareStatement

        protected java.sql.PreparedStatement prepareStatement​(java.sql.Connection connection,
                                                      java.lang.String sql,
                                                      java.lang.Object... params)
                                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates a PreparedStatement and sets any arguments. This method provides basic functionality. If any more advanced functionality is necessary then the caller should prepare their own statement instead of using this method.
        Parameters:
        connection - The connection.
        sql - The SQL statement.
        params - The parameters.
        Returns:
        The prepared statement.

        java.sql.SQLException
